meanings.definition: Boychiks: plural noun, meaning young boys or young men.
meanings.sent1: The group of boychiks played soccer in the park.
meanings.sent2: The boychiks were excited to go camping together.
meanings.sent3: The boychiks' laughter filled the air as they raced each other.
meanings.sent4: The boychiks' energy was contagious, bringing life to the party.
meanings.sent5: The image of the boychiks running around happily stayed with me.

meanings.definition: Boychiks: verb, meaning to act in a youthful or boyish manner.
meanings.sent1: He always boychiks around, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: She boychiks by playing pranks on her friends.
meanings.sent3: The way he boychiks during meetings lightens the mood.
meanings.sent4: Her carefree spirit boychiks through everything she does.
meanings.sent5: Their playful banter boychiks up the room, making it lively.
